sections.headline: Welcome to Downtown Irwin
sections.subheadline: The biggest little town in Pennsylvania

sections.heading: The Irwin Business & Professional Association (IBPA)
sections.body: The IBPA is an all volunteer group that promotes the health & vitality of Irwin for the benefit of the surrounding communities.

sections.heading: Get Involved
sections.description: Join us at a meeting! All are welcome. Meetings are held every Thursday from 8:00 - 9:00 a.m. in downtown Irwin.
